sect2.title: GCC Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, nm, ranlib Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, cp, dirname, echo, expr, hostname, ln ls, mkdir, mv, rm, sleep, tail, touch, tr, true, uname Diffutils: cmp Find: find GCC: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed Tar: tar Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo
